title: Mussel stew with garlic
description: Homemade aïoli thickens and adds irresistible garlicky flavour to this delicious seafood stew. Use bread to mop up all the lovely juices - slightly stale is best as it will hold together better.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz oil, (mix sunflower and olive oil, to taste. Olive oil makes it a heavier taste.)
large chunks of stale bread, to serve
